title: Create romantic proposal web page for Nibtahil

requirements.summary: Create a romantic-themed landing page that asks 'Nibtahil, will you be mine?' with pink and white color scheme
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays the question 'Nibtahil, will you be mine?' prominently
Pink and white color scheme is applied throughout the design

file_operations.description: Transform the App component into a romantic proposal page with centered layout displaying the question 'Nibtahil, will you be mine?' prominently. Apply pink and white color scheme using Tailwind classes. Remove any existing demo content and create a clean, romantic-themed design with proper spacing and typography.

Update global styles to apply pink and white color scheme throughout the application. Set a romantic background (soft pink gradient or solid color) and ensure text colors complement the theme. Add any custom CSS needed for the romantic aesthetic.

requirements.summary: Add two interactive buttons labeled 'Yes' and 'No' with the No button moving away randomly when the user hovers over it
acceptanceCriteria: No button moves to a random position when hovered over
No button cannot be clicked due to hover behavior
Yes button remains stationary and clickable

file_operations.description: Create a ProposalButtons component that renders two buttons: 'Yes' and 'No'. Implement hover detection on the No button that triggers random repositioning using absolute positioning with random top/left percentages. Use state to track No button position and handle onMouseEnter event. Style both buttons with pink/white theme. Yes button should be stationary and handle onClick to trigger image display. For mobile compatibility, also handle touchstart events on the No button to move it before touch interaction completes.

Import and integrate the ProposalButtons component into the main layout. Add state management to track whether Yes has been clicked. Pass callback function to ProposalButtons to handle Yes button clicks. Position buttons appropriately below the main question text.

requirements.summary: Display the uploaded romantic emoji image when the Yes button is clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Yes button displays the uploaded image
The exact uploaded image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) is shown without modifications
Image is displayed prominently and clearly

file_operations.description: Add state to track whether the Yes button has been clicked. When clicked, conditionally render an image component displaying the romantic emoji from frontend/public/assets/generated/431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg. Replace or hide the question text and buttons when showing the image. Center the image and ensure it displays prominently with appropriate sizing for both desktop and mobile views.

requirements.summary: Ensure the page is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile devices (iPad and phones) using Chrome browser
acceptanceCriteria: Page is responsive and adapts to mobile screen sizes
All interactive elements work correctly on touch devices
Page renders properly in Chrome on iPad and phones
Button hover behavior is adapted for touch interactions

file_operations.description: Enhance mobile responsiveness by adding touch event handlers (touchstart) in addition to hover events for the No button movement. Ensure buttons are sized appropriately for touch targets (minimum 44x44px). Use responsive Tailwind classes for button sizing and spacing. Test that No button moves on touch before user can tap it.

Add responsive design patterns using Tailwind breakpoints (sm, md, lg) for text sizing, spacing, and layout. Ensure the main question text scales appropriately on smaller screens. Add viewport meta tag verification in the HTML template. Make the romantic emoji image responsive with max-width constraints and proper aspect ratio handling for various screen sizes.

Add responsive utility classes and ensure the pink/white color scheme works across all device sizes. Add CSS to prevent text selection and unwanted touch behaviors that might interfere with the interactive experience on mobile devices.

requirements.summary: Render the uploaded romantic emoji image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated
Image is accessible for display in the frontend

file_operations.description: Copy the uploaded romantic emoji image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) to this location as a static asset. This image will be referenced in the App component when the Yes button is clicked. No modifications should be made to the image content.
